subject: Sturgeon (Fish)
Fish and Other Marine Life
Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: The sturgeon spearfishing season at Lake Winnebago, the largest lake in Wisconsin, attracts ice fishermen to the lake and relatives and neighbors to the check-ins.
snippet: The sturgeon spearfishing season at Lake Winnebago, the largest lake in Wisconsin, attracts ice fishermen to the lake and relatives and neighbors to the check-ins.
